trans-unit.source:
\n

Defines a structure that holds the raw data for a performance counter.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxx x xxxxxxxxx xxxx xxxxx xxx xxx xxxx xxx x xxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Defines an empty, uninitialized performance counter sample of type NumberOfItems32.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxx xx xxxxx$ xxxxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx xx xxxx $xxxxxx$XxxxxxXxXxxxx00$$xxxxxx$.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The numeric value associated with the performance counter sample.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxx xxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

An optional, base raw value for the counter, to use only if the sample is based on multiple counters.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xx xxxxxxxx$ xxxx xxx xxxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxx$ xx xxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxx xx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The frequency with which the counter is read.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xx xxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The frequency with which the system reads from the counter.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xxxxx xxx xxxxxx xxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The numeric value associated with the performance counter sample.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxx xxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

An optional, base raw value for the counter, to use only if the sample is based on multiple counters.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xx xxxxxxxx$ xxxx xxx xxxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxx$ xx xxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxx xx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The frequency with which the counter is read.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xx xxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The frequency with which the system reads from the counter.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xxxxx xxx xxxxxx xxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The time at which the sample was taken.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xx xxxxx xxx xxxxxx xxx xxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets an optional, base raw value for the counter.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xx xxxxxxxx$ xxxx xxx xxxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The base raw value, which is used only if the sample is based on multiple counters.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xxx xxxxx$ xxxxx xx xxxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxx xx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The frequency with which the counter is read.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The time at which the sample was taken.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xx xxxxx xxx xxxxxx xxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets the raw value of the counter.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxx xxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The numeric value that is associated with the performance counter sample.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxx xxxxx xxxx xx xxxxxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The frequency with which the system reads from the counter.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xxxxx xxx xxxxxx xxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The system time stamp, represented within 0.1 millisecond.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxx xxxx xxxxx$ xxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxx 0.0 xxxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Calculates the performance data of the counter, using a single sample point.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxxx$ xxxxx x xxxxxx xxxxxx xxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
This method is generally used for uncalculated performance counter types.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Calculates the performance data of the counter, using two sample points.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxxx$ xxxxx xxx xxxxxx xxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
This method is generally used for calculated performance counter types, such as averages.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxxxx$ xxxx xx xxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

\ntrue if sample is equal to the current instance; otherwise, false.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx $xx$xxxxxx$$xx$ xx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxx$ xxxxxxxxx$ $xxxxxx$xxxxx$$xxxxxx$.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets a hash code for the current counter sample.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx x xxxx xxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

A hash code for the current counter sample.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$X xxxx xxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source: true if a and b are not equal; otherwise, false
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx $xx$x$$xx$ xxx $xx$x$$xx$ xxx xxx xxxxx$ xxxxxxxxx$ $xxxxxx$xxxxx$$xxxxxx$$$x$$x
